Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Allada, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from Chocolate Museum and Photographic Archive of Barcelona. This aparthotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 19 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include multilingual staff and an elevator (lift).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
Additional policies and fees may apply when booking more than 3 rooms. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. This hotel maintains a strict no-party policy. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. Please note that only the number of guests indicated at time of booking have access to the apartment.

Make yourself at home in one of the 19 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

With a stay at Aparthotel Allada, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from Chocolate Museum and Photographic Archive of Barcelona. This aparthotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chocolate Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Photographic Archive of Barcelona - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Picasso Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Santa Caterina Market - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Mercat del Born - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Basilica de Santa Maria del Mar - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Arc de Triomf - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palau de la Musica Catalana - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Barcelona History Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Barcelona Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Parc de la Ciutadella - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Barcelona Zoo - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Casa Calvet - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Port Vell - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tivoli Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Allada is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 12.8 km / 7.9 mi.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
Additional policies and fees may apply when booking more than 3 rooms. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. This hotel maintains a strict no-party policy. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. Please note that only the number of guests indicated at time of booking have access to the apartment.

Message.Text:
LOS CLIENTES DEBEN MOSTRAR SU DNI O PASAPORTE Y SU TARJETA DE CREDITO PARA REALIZAR EL CHECK INN. SIN ESTOS DOCUMENTOS NO PODRAN ACCEDER AL APARTAMENTO. GUESTS ARE REQUIRED TO SHOW A DNI OR PASSPORT AND CREDIT CARD UPON CHECK INN. WITHOUT THESE DOCUMENTS ACCESS WILL BE DENIED.

 ***** INFORMACION IMPORTANTE ****** TODOS LOS APARTAMENTOS SON ESTANCIAS DE UN SOLO ESPACIO. TIPO LOFT. NO DISPONEN DE HABITACIONES. ALL APARTMENTS ARE STAYS OF A SINGLE SPACE, TYPE LOFT. DO NOT HAVE ROOMS. **** EL APARTHOTEL ALLADA ENTIENDE COMO GRUPO UNA RESERVA DE 3 O MAS HABITACIONES. PARA RESERVAS DE MAS DE 3 HABITACIONES, CONTACTEN CON NUESTRO DEPARTAMENTO DE GRUPOS Y EVENTOS. THE ALLADA APARTHOTEL UNDERSTANDS A GROUP OF 3 OR MORE ROOMS AS A GROUP. FOR RESERVATIONS OF MORE THAN 3 ROOMS, CONTACT WITH OUR GROUPS AND EVENTS DEPARTMENT.

EL DIA DE ENTRADA SE CARGARA UN DEPOSITO DE 80EUR (NOV-ABR)Y DE 250EUR (MAY- ³OCT O EVENTOS ESPECIALES). ESTE DEPOSITO SERA DEVUELTO INTEGRAMENTE EL DIA LA SALIDA SIEMPRE QUE EL APARTAMENTO ESTE EN LAS CONDICIONES EN LAS QUE SE LO ENCONTRO *** * UPON ARRIVAL WE TAKE A DIPOSIT AS GUARANTEE. 80EUR (NOV-APR) AND 250EUR (MAY-OCT AND ESPECIAL EVENTS). THIS AMOUNT WILL BE FULL REFUNDED UPON DEPARTURE IF THE APARTMENT IS ON THE SAME CONDITIONS THAT WAS FOUND.

*** INFORMACION IMPORTANTE *** RECEPCION Y ENTREGA DE LLAVESEN LA CALLE ALLADA-VERMELL, 6-8. NOS ENCONTRARA CADA DIA DE 10:30 A 18:30 HRS. TAMBIEN DISPONEMOS DE UNA RECEPCION DE 7 A 3 H EN LA CALLE MUNTANER,60. ES MUY IMPORTANTE QUE NOS CONTACTE CON UN MINIMO DE 48 HRS ANTES DE SU LLEGADA PARA ACORDAR CON USTED LA OPCION DE CHECK-INN Y LA ENTREGA DE LLAVES E INFORMARLE DE TODO EL PROCESO. TELEFONO 34 93 268 33 88 O hsalle@barcelona-apartment.com LIMPIEZA: SOLO EN ESTANCIAS DE 6 O MAS NOCHES HAY INCLUIDA UNA UNICA LIMPIEZA GENERAL DEL APARTAMENTO. LA COCINA DEBE QUEDAR COMPLETAMENTE RECOGIDA EL ULTIMO DIA DE ESTANCIA.

** INFORMACION IMPORTANTE ** LOS APARTAMENTOS NO DISPONEN DE CAMAS EXTRAS. NI¥OS PAGAN COMO ADULTOS. CUNAS ON REQUEST 5,5 EUROS. NO DISPONEN DE SERVICIO DE LAVANDERIA COMUN. CHECK-INN 14:00 HRS / CHECK OUT 11:00 HRS ** LOS APARTAMENTOS STANDARD (11+12) SOLO DISPONEN DE OFFICE, NO COCINA ** ** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ** THE APARTMENTS NOT HAVE EXTRA BEDS. CHILDREN CHARGED AS ADULT. COTS ON REQUEST 5,5 EUROS. THE APARTMENTS HAVE NO LAUNDRY COMMUNITY SERVIC CHECK-INN 14:00 HRS / CHECK-OUT 11:00 HRS STD ROOMS(11+12)THEY WILL HAVE ONLY OFFICE, NO HAVE A FULL EQUIPE KITCHEN

****************************************************************************** RECEPTION AND DELIVERY OF KEYS IN C/ ALLADA-VERMELL,6-8. WE WILL FIND EVERY DAY FROM 10:30 TO 18:30. WE ALSO HAVE A RECEPTION FROM 07:00 TO 03:00 AT C/MUNTANER,60. ITS VERY IMPORTANT THAT YOU CONTACT US WITH A MINIMUM OF 48 HOURS BEFORE YOUR ARRIVAL TO DEAL WITH YOU THE CHECK-IN OPTION AND DELIVER OF KEYS AND INFORM IT EVERYTHING THE PROCESS. CONTACT TELEPHONE: +34 93 268 33 88 OR hsalle@barcelona-apartment.com CLEANING: ONLY IN A STAY OF 6 OR MORE NIGHTS, THERE IS A SINGLE GENERAL CLEANING OF THE APARTMENT. THE KITCHEN HAS TO COMPLETELY COLLECT THE LAST DAY OF THE STAY.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
